TextLibrary.Text: Hey! You have been a good friend. A GOOD friend! You want to see my TREASURE?

Hey! You have been a good friend. A GOOD friend! You want to see my TREASURE?
Hey! You have been a good friend. A GOOD friend! You want to see my TREASURE?
The Crown Jewels of Selentia? I would love to see them, Patch.
The Crown Jewels of Selentia? I would love to see them, Patch.
The Crown Jewels of Selentia? I would love to see them, Patch.
The Crown Jewels of Selentia? I would love to see them, Patch.
Yes! Then you will follow me. Only me. I will lead you there.
